column1: Advanced Computer Science with Data Science
column5: Our MSc Advanced Computer Science with Data Science gives you the skill set needed in a range of industries. You'll gain an understanding of the new challenges posed by the data revolution, particularly in relation to its modelling, storage and access.Data scientists are in high demand across a number of sectors, as businesses require people with the right combination of technical, analytical and communication skills. (Prospects, 2022).Opportunities for graduates exist in a range of industries such as:financefilms and gamespharmaceuticalshealthcareconsumer productspublic servicesOur Advanced Computer Science with Data Science Masters gives you the skill set needed.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
